item.title: 怎么理解CPS?(1)
item.description: 这段时间学racket终于遇到了传说中的CPS, 不出意外果然很难理解。先来看一下维基百科中对CPS的定义: In functional programming, continuation-passing style (CPS) is a style of programming in which control is passed explicitly
